sentences.english: All college and university students would benefit from spending at least one semester studying in a foreign country.
sentences.chinese: 学院或大学应该要肄业生在国外至少进修一个学期。

sentences.english: He received his undergraduate degree from the U. S. Air Force Academy and flew Air Rescue "Jolly Greens" in Vietnam.
sentences.chinese: 他是美国空军学院的肄业生，在越南开飞机拯救伤员。

sentences.english: An undergraduate who is not yet a senior.
sentences.chinese: 还没有上大四的大学肄业生。

definition: to attend (a school)/to drop out (of college etc)
certificate of partial completion/certificate of attendance (for a student who did not graduate)
to return to school (after an interruption)/to resume one's studies

to pass an entrance exam/to be admitted to
